ability.Guts: If this Pokemon is in a status, its Attack is 1.5x, ignoring burn halving physical damage.

Wild Charge.effect: The user takes 1/4 of the damage dealt in recoil.

Crunch.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Ice Fang.effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make it flinch.
